statements: SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, scanning_timestamp FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE scanned_area = 'left_eye' ORDER BY scanning_timestamp ASC;
SELECT employee_name, scanned_area FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT employee_name, scanning_timestamp FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY scanning_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE scanning_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, scanned_area FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE scanned_area LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_scans, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM scanning_timestamp) AS scan_month FROM RetinaScanningData GROUP BY scan_month;
SELECT DISTINCT scanned_area FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE employee_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY scanned_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM retina_scanning_data ORDER BY scan_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, scan_result FROM retina_scanning_data WHERE scan_result = 'Pass';
SELECT scan_date FROM retina_scanning_data WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE area_id = 3 AND access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, scan_date, scan_result FROM retina_scanning_data WHERE scan_result LIKE '%Fail%' ORDER BY scan_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM retina_scanning_data WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY scan_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, scan_result FROM retina_scanning_data WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01' AND scan_result = 'approved';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_scans FROM retina_scanning_data GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_scans > 5;
SELECT r.employee_id, a.area_id, a.access_granted FROM retina_scanning_data r JOIN access_control a ON r.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE a.area_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(scan_date) AS latest_scan_date, MIN(scan_date) AS earliest_scan_date FROM retina_scanning_data;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT' AND employee_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScans WHERE scan_result = TRUE ORDER BY scan_time DESC;
SELECT area_name, security_level FROM SecureAreas WHERE security_level >= 3 ORDER BY security_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM AccessLogs WHERE successful_access = true;
SELECT area_name, security_level FROM SecureAreas ORDER BY security_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND employee_id > 100;
SELECT Employees.employee_id, Employees.first_name, RetinaScans.scan_time FROM Employees INNER JOIN RetinaScans ON Employees.employee_id = RetinaScans.employee_id;
SELECT Employees.first_name, Employees.last_name, SecureAreas.area_name FROM Employees LEFT JOIN SecureAreas ON Employees.department = SecureAreas.area_name;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, position FROM Employee WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessLog ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, area_name, access_level FROM SecureArea WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM Employee WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT e.name, a.area_name FROM Employee e INNER JOIN AreaAccess aa ON e.employee_id = aa.employee_id INNER JOIN SecureArea a ON aa.area_id = a.area_id;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, ra.retina_scan_data AS scan_data FROM Employee e INNER JOIN RetinaData ra ON e.employee_id = ra.employee_id WHERE ra.scan_time >= '2022-01-01';
